name: White Rose
description: The white rose of the Balkans, with a delicate and slightly spicy fragrance, adds a touch of purity and freshness to our compositions.

name: May Rose
description: Hand-harvested in May, this centifolia rose exudes a rich and voluptuous scent, the heart of many mythical fragrances.

name: Damask Rose
description: Cultivated since antiquity, the Damask rose offers an enchanting scent, both fruity and spicy, highly prized in perfumery.

name: Musk
description: A plant-based alternative to animal musk, this essence offers a warm, sensual, and enveloping note to oriental fragrances.

name: Bergamot
description: This small sun citrus, grown exclusively in Calabria, brings a sparkling and bright freshness to fragrances.

name: Ginger
description: A rhizome with spicy and citrus notes, ginger adds a vibrant and energizing touch to compositions.

name: Ambergris
description: A rare concretion floating in the oceans, ambergris develops a marine, animal, and deeply enchanting scent over time.

name: Amber
description: Fossilized resin with warm and vanilla notes, amber adds a comforting sweetness to oriental fragrances.

name: Agarwood (Oud)
description: A precious resin from a sick tree, oud emits a woody, complex, and mysterious fragrance, often referred to as 'liquid gold.'

name: Tuberose
description: A nocturnal flower with a heady scent, tuberose exudes an enchanting sensuality, between creamy floral and animal notes.

name: Jasmine
description: The grandiflorum jasmine, harvested at dawn, reveals an enchanting scent, both sensual and delicate, the king of flowers in perfumery.

name: Orange Blossom
description: Neroli and orange blossom, two treasures of the bitter orange tree, offer different facets of the same flower: vibrant freshness or enveloping softness.

name: Vetiver
description: Deep roots with a woody, earthy, and slightly smoky scent, Haitian vetiver is the foundational note of elegant masculine perfumes.

name: Sandalwood
description: Precious wood with a sweet and creamy scent, Australian sandalwood adds a warm and sensual foundational note.

name: Leather
description: Olfactory note recreating the scent of tanned leather, adding a virile and sophisticated dimension to fragrances.

name: Camellia
description: Delicate flower with a subtle and slightly herbaceous scent, camellia adds a touch of floral freshness.

name: Cherry Blossom
description: Cherry blossom (sakura) with a delicate and slightly bitter scent, evoking spring and rebirth.

name: Magnolia
description: Majestic flower with a scent that is both lemony and vanilla, bringing a sophisticated floral note.

name: Cedarwood
description: Noble wood with a dry and woody scent, cedar adds a reassuring and masculine foundational note.

name: Agarwood
description: Rare resin with a complex, woody, and slightly smoky scent, highly prized in oriental perfumery.

name: Pepper
description: Black pepper berries adding a spicy, vibrant, and slightly fruity note to compositions.

name: Mandarin
description: Sweet and juicy citrus, mandarin brings a cheerful and sunny freshness to fragrances.

name: Blackcurrant
description: Blackcurrant berries providing a fruity, slightly green, and tangy note to compositions.

name: Citrus
description: A blend of Mediterranean citrus fruits bringing a bright and luminous freshness to the top of the fragrance.

name: Lemon
description: Yellow lemon with a bright zest, adding a fresh, tangy, and tonic note to compositions.

name: Coconut
description: Coconut flesh providing a creamy, gourmet, and exotic note to sunny fragrances.

name: Lychee
description: Delicate fruit with a floral and fruity scent, lychee adds a touch of Asian freshness.

name: Vanilla
description: Black pods filled with sunshine, Madagascar vanilla offers a comforting and gourmet sweetness to oriental compositions.

name: Tonka Bean
description: Bean with a complex scent, between almond, vanilla, and tobacco, adding a warm and gourmet note.

name: Lime
description: Lime with an explosive and refreshing scent, bringing vibrant energy to compositions.

name: Strawberry
description: Gariguette strawberry providing a fruity, juicy, and slightly green note to gourmet fragrances.

name: Raspberry
description: Wild raspberry with an intense and slightly tangy scent, adding a sophisticated fruity touch.

name: Cherry
description: Black cherry with a deep and slightly bitter scent, providing an intense fruity note.

name: Milk
description: Milky note adding a comforting and enveloping sweetness to gourmet fragrances.

name: Bitter Orange
description: Bitter orange with an intense and slightly bitter scent, widely used in perfumery for its luminous essence.

name: Osmanthus
description: Osmanthus flower with a unique scent, combining apricot, leather, and white flower, highly valued in niche perfumery.

name: Ambrette
description: Ambrette seeds, a plant-based alternative to animal musk, providing a warm and slightly fruity note.

name: Patchouli
description: Dried leaves with an earthy and woody scent, patchouli adds a mysterious and sensual touch to oriental fragrances.

name: Aldehyde
description: Organic compounds providing effervescent notes, sometimes compared to champagne or luxurious soap.

name: Geranium
description: Rosat geranium leaves with a scent that is floral, mentholated, and slightly fruity.

name: Violet
description: Violet flower with a sweet and powder y scent, adding a retro and delicate note to compositions.

name: Apple
description: Golden apple providing a fruity, fresh, and slightly green note to youthful and dynamic fragrances.

name: Lavender
description: Fine lavender from Provence with a fresh, herbal, and slightly camphoraceous scent, the base of classic masculine perfumes.
